def_cn: (尤指讨论重大公共问题的)论坛，会议场所，讨论会
def_en: A forum is a place, situation, or group in which people exchange ideas and discuss issues, especially important public issues.

def_cn: (古罗马城镇中讨论商业和政治问题的)广场
def_en: In ancient Roman towns, the forum was a square where people met to discuss business and political matters.
